fragments.content: I know It's not a good thing to owe money but aren't we still in the middle of the game, the red-packet just a way to increase the fun of the game by highlight the importance of winning, obviously there have two different definitions of red-packet, so um in the other way we come to an agreement which is we both don't wanna play the fucking game any more with each other.
I always don't know my mistake until I make them, that's bad practice, maybe I should think it over before start quarrel with somebody, egoist is not a cool word.
